name: Massachusetts Mutual Life Insurance Company
summary: Massachusetts Mutual Life Insurance Company (MassMutual) is a leading mutual life insurance company founded in 1851 and headquartered in Springfield, Massachusetts. It provides a wide range of financial products, including life insurance, disability income insurance, long-term care insurance, annuities, and wealth management services. As a mutual company, it operates for the benefit of its policyholders and is recognized for its innovation and financial strength.
